Nlloc

Submodules

nlloc

class SeisMonitor.monitor.locator.nlloc.nlloc.NLLoc(core_path: str, agency: str, region: list, vel_model: VelModel, stations: Stations, delta_in_km: float = 2, kwargs_for_trans: dict = {}, kwargs_for_vel2grid: dict = {}, kwargs_for_grid2time: dict = {}, kwargs_for_time2loc: dict = {}, tmp_folder: str = '/home/edc240000/SeisMonitor/docs', exhaustively: bool = False, search_in_degrees: list = [], rm_attempts: bool = False)[source]

Bases: object

NonLinLoc seismic event locator class.

This class implements the NonLinLoc algorithm for locating seismic events using velocity models and station information.

compute_travel_times()[source]

Compute travel times using velocity model and station locations.

locate(catalog: Catalog | str, nlloc_out_folder: str, out_filename: str = 'locations.xml', out_format: str = 'SC3ML') → Catalog[source]

Main location method with optional exhaustive search.

Parameters:

  • catalog – Input catalog or path

  • nlloc_out_folder – Output directory

  • out_filename – Output filename

  • out_format – Output format

Returns:

Located event catalog

SeisMonitor.monitor.locator.nlloc.utils.write_1d_vel_model(vel_path, out, compute_vs=True, vp_vs_ratio=1.78)[source]

Write 1D velocity model file from CSV data.

Parameters:

  • vel_path (str) – Path to input velocity CSV file

  • out (str) – Output file path

  • compute_vs (bool) – Calculate Vs from Vp if True (default: True)

  • vp_vs_ratio (float) – Vp/Vs ratio for Vs calculation (default: 1.78)
